RecipeDef.label: Build Colt M1911
RecipeDef.description: Build Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.

RecipeDef.label: Build SIG Sauer P226
RecipeDef.description: The SIG Sauer P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. The SIG Sauer P226 and its variants are in service with numerous law enforcement and military organizations worldwide. Low damage, high rate of fire and good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Lee-Enfield
RecipeDef.description: Build Ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Uzi
RecipeDef.description: Build a personal defense weapon is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Spectre M4 Luger
RecipeDef.description: Build a compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

RecipeDef.label: Build Remington 870
RecipeDef.description: Build Ancient Shotgun for personal defence.

RecipeDef.label: Build M37A2 Pumpshotgun
RecipeDef.description: The M37A2 Pump Shotgun, also known as the M37A2 Combat Shotgun, is a pump-action combat shotgun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. The M37A2 is a simple and effective pump-action shotgun; its "classic" pump-action allows extremely powerful shells to be fired reliably. The M37A2 is employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and Weyland-Yutani PMCs.

RecipeDef.label: Build M24 sniper rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.

RecipeDef.label: Build M42A Scope Rifle
RecipeDef.description: The M42A Scope Rifle is an American-made semi-automatic sniper rifle chambered for 10mm M252 HEAP ammunition. It is employed as the primary sniper weapon of the United States Colonial Marine Corps.

RecipeDef.label: Build SVU OTs-03 Dragunov
RecipeDef.description: The OTs-03 SVU is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. High damage, long range and very good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build L-15 LMG
RecipeDef.description: Build LMG for personal defence.

RecipeDef.label: Build M240 FlameThrower
RecipeDef.description: The M240 Incinerator Unit, also known as the M240 Flamethrower (or M240 Flame Thrower) and colloquially as the "Bake-a-Flake", is a carbine-style flamethrower employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. The M240 is undoubtedly one of the most fearsome weapons in the Marine inventory, and has proven especially useful in close combat against soft targets. It is also ideal for use against fortifications.

RecipeDef.label: Build M56 smart gun
RecipeDef.description: The M56 Smartgun is a man-portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities chambered for 10?28mm Caseless ammunition. It is notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. It hurts like hell.

RecipeDef.label: Build XM214 Microgun
RecipeDef.description: Build a multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.

RecipeDef.label: Build R2 charge rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build charged-shot energy/projectile rifle.

RecipeDef.label: Build M16 Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a general-purpose military weapon for field or urban combat.

RecipeDef.label: Build SIG SG553
RecipeDef.description: The SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel Rifle) version of the SIG SG550. It fires the 5.56x45mm NATO round. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Steyr AUG A3
RecipeDef.description: The Steyr AUG is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault rifle, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build FN SCAR-H
RecipeDef.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading rifle with a rotating bolt. The rifle was developed by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. Good damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build FAMAS G2
RecipeDef.description: The FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-Étienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service rifle of the French military. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build RL T9 Burning Sun
RecipeDef.description: Build Incendiary Launcher for personal defence.

RecipeDef.label: Deconstruct personal shield
RecipeDef.description: Deconstruct a personal shield.

RecipeDef.label: Build Remington M95 deringer
RecipeDef.description: Build a small decorated revolver. Accurate at short range only, moderately damaging with a short aim- and cooldown period.

RecipeDef.label: Build Sphinx AT 2000
RecipeDef.description: Build a high quality and highly durable handgun, used by elite forces and sports shooters. Great accuracy, moderate damage and a tad slow.

RecipeDef.label: Build Vektor CP1
RecipeDef.description: Build ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, but weak and with a slightly lower range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Para Ordnance P14-45
RecipeDef.description: Build a counterfeit ancient 45 ACP handgun with slightly improved internal mechanisms and plastic frame. High accuracy and above average range, average fire rate and damage.

RecipeDef.label: Build Tec-9
RecipeDef.description: Build a lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Silenced TMP
RecipeDef.description: Build a Silenced TMP.

RecipeDef.label: Build Beretta 93R
RecipeDef.description: Build a nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode, low stopping power and hits up to pistol range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Mosin-Nagant M91
RecipeDef.description: Build an ancient bolt-action rifle. Probably pulled from a basement somewhere. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Scorpion EVO 3
RecipeDef.description: Build a machinepistol or light SMG with a notorious folding stock design. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at pistol range.

RecipeDef.label: Build M3 Greasegun
RecipeDef.description: Build a very simplistic submachinegun design for todays standards. Low damage, high firerate, short range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Kriss Vector K10
RecipeDef.description: Build a submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximal range by a lot.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK MP5A3
RecipeDef.description: The Heckler Koch MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun of German design, developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler Koch GmbH of Oberndorf am Neckar. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK UMP45
RecipeDef.description: The UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. The UMP45 has been adopted by various agencies such as the U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Heckler Koch developed the UMP45 as a successor to the MP5. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Striker Shotgun
RecipeDef.description: Build a cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun. Has a higher fire rate and high damage output, but low range.

RecipeDef.label: Build M45 Tactical Shotgun
RecipeDef.description: Build a M45 Tactical Shotgun is a shotgun used by the United Nations Space Command Army.

RecipeDef.label: Build Atchisson Assault AA-12
RecipeDef.description: Build an automatic shotgun with almost no recoil. Burstfires, moderately accurate just under rifle range, and has high damage output.

RecipeDef.label: Build M90 CAWS
RecipeDef.description: Build a M90 Close Assault Weapon System(M90 CAWS) is the UNSC's primary shotgun and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces.

RecipeDef.label: Build Walther WA 2000 Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a limited edition olden days sniper rifle. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK XM8 Military Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build an ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build AK-47
RecipeDef.description: The AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62×39mm assault rifle, first developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is officially known as Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова). Good damage, average range and rate of fire, poor accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build MA5 Assault rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a MA5 Individual Combat Weapon System (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault rifle) is a standard-issue service rifle of the UNSC Marines.

RecipeDef.label: Build Beretta CX4
RecipeDef.description: Build a highly reliable, compact pistol calibre carbine designed to fire pistol rounds up to rifle range. Below average damage, average fire rate, above average range and fires in two round burst.

RecipeDef.label: Build Ruger PC-9
RecipeDef.description: Build a pistol calibre carbine sidearm carried on the back. Its long barrel allows it to fire pistol bullets at rifle range. Average damage, above average fire rate and range.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK USC
RecipeDef.description: Build a stable semi-automatic pistol calibre carbine with low kickback and an unusual stock design. Average damage, above average fire rate and range, fires three round bursts.

RecipeDef.label: Build AKS-74U
RecipeDef.description: The AKS-74U short assault rifle (the "U" suffix means"Ukorochennyj" in Russian = "Shortened" in English) has been developed in the late 1970s from the AKS-74 assault rifle. The AKS-74U was intended as a personal defense weapon for tank, gun, helicopter and other vehicle crews,and for the special operations forces. The AKS-74U has the size and effective range of a typical submachine gun, but has advantage of the assault rifle ammunition and magazines. Average damage and rate of fire, low range, poor accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build M4A1 Carabine
RecipeDef.description: The M4 carbine is a shorter and lighter variant of the M16A2 assault rifle, is heavily used by the United States Armed Forces and is replacing the M16 rifle in most United States Army and United States Marine Corps combat units as the primary infantry weapon. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build RPK-74
RecipeDef.description: Build an Ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build MA39X Assault rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a MA39X Individual Combat Weapon System (MA39X ICWS or MA39X Assault rifle) is a close combat service rifle of the UNSC.

RecipeDef.label: Build AM Barrett M82
RecipeDef.description: The M82 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. It is used by many units and armies around the world. Despite its designation as an anti-materiel rifle, it is used by some armed forces as an anti-personnel sniper rifle. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build SRS99 AM sniper rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a Sniper Rifle System Anti-Materiel, more formally known as the Special Applications Rifle, Caliber 14.5 mm, SRS99, is a United Nations Space Command sniper rifle.

RecipeDef.label: Build Armalite AR-50
RecipeDef.description: Build a heavy and accurate, military-grade bolt-action rifle chambered for .50 calibre bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lower recoil. Average firerate, very high damage, accuracy and range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Micor Defense MD50
RecipeDef.description: Build an autoloading anti-materiel rifle with a compact bullpup design allowing it to be operated and carried by a single person. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Ultima Ratio Hecate II
RecipeDef.description: Build a special application scoped rifle with a long muzzle break and wooden stock. Packs and ton both in battle and when carried, greatly slowing any wielders pace. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Milkor MGL
RecipeDef.description: Build a launcher type weapon that fires 40mm concussive grenades at a higher rate than a human could.

RecipeDef.label: Build XS5 StunGun
RecipeDef.description: Build Stungun pistol.

RecipeDef.label: Build EMP Grenades
RecipeDef.description: Build EMP Grenades.

RecipeDef.label: Build shock Grenades
RecipeDef.description: Build shock Grenades.

RecipeDef.label: Build RPG-7
RecipeDef.description: Build Rangy RPG Launcher.

RecipeDef.label: Build M5 RPG
RecipeDef.description: The M5 Rocket Propelled Grenade (RPG) is a portable, shoulder-fired, reloadable, semi-automatic unguided anti-armor rocket-propelled grenade launcher used by United States Colonial Marine Corps as their standard issue RPG. Able to load up to 4 rockets, the M5 RPG is the favorite anti-infantry toy of the USCM.

RecipeDef.label: Build .44 Remington Magnum
RecipeDef.description: Build The .44 Magnum is based on a lengthened .44 Special case, loaded to higher pressures for greater velocity (and thus, energy).

RecipeDef.label: Build One-beam Laser rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a fantastic laser rifle with using mechanoid tech.

RecipeDef.label: Build Tri-beam Laser rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a fantastic Heavy Laser rifle with using mechanoid tech.

RecipeDef.label: Build Penta-beam laser rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a fantastic Burst Laser rifle with using mechanoid tech.

RecipeDef.label: Build C3 Plasma Carbine
RecipeDef.description: Build a short range, lightweight plasma rifle

RecipeDef.label: Build C7 Multi-Plasma Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build plasma rifle with good stopping power and range.

RecipeDef.label: Build C2 Plasma Precision Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build plasma sniper rifle, highly accurate but with a low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Railgun XZero
RecipeDef.description: Build an electrically charged electromagnetic projectile launcher.

RecipeDef.label: Build PTRD-41 rifle
RecipeDef.description: Build a Anti tank rifle, with special armor piercing penetration rounds.

RecipeDef.label: Build M72 LAW
RecipeDef.description: Anti tank rocket launcher, with special armor piercing penetration rocket.

RecipeDef.label: Build FGM-148 Javelin
RecipeDef.description: Build an FGM-148 Javelin Anti-tank missile launcher.

RecipeDef.label: Build Desert Eagle .45 ACP
RecipeDef.description: Build the legendary desert eagle .50 ACP. Marines favorite toy.

RecipeDef.label: Build VSS Thread cutter
RecipeDef.description: Build a special forces sniper rifle VSS Vintorez.

RecipeDef.label: Build TAR-21
RecipeDef.description: Build a marine sturm rifle is the standard firearm for all combat personnel in the Colonial Marine Corps.

RecipeDef.label: Build M249 SAW MG
RecipeDef.description: Build a marine M249 hand machinegun..
